title: Transparent TV show credits font
content:
Does anyone know what font is used on the credits of amazon's new tv show - transparent?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113195928/http:/typophile.com/files/image_196.jpg) | 57.67 KB |
author: Kro49

comments.content: It would be better if you capture a frame of the credits and upload it here or at least (if the credits video is available somewhere online) post the video's URL and the exact time you are interested into.

Probably ITC [Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113195928/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman) Italic Swash. I strongly recommend you Mark Simonson's revival of it [Bookmania](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113195928/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania).
